author: Nicholas Bariyo
title: Congo at ‘Very High’ Risk as Ebola Strikes Major City
text:
Aid organizations and the Congolese government rushed supplies and health experts Friday to a major city in Congo, after the World Health Organization raised the public-health risk from the latest Ebola outbreak to “very high.” WHO officials stopped short of declaring an international emergency.
Congo’s threat from the deadly disease was elevated from high by the WHO, which also upped the risk to neighboring nations to high from moderate. “Very high” is the second-highest risk level available, below serious.
